Marketing / Wealth Management Officer Job at Sky Capital and Financial Allied International Limited




        
    

        
        Sky Capital Asset Management is a forward-thinking investment firm backed by years of combined Leadership expertise. With a strong financial foundation and an impressive track record, we deliver innovative financial services that empower both individuals and institutions to grow and succeed.As we scale, we are seeking results-driven professionals to join our high-performance team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing / Wealth Management Officer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos

Job Overview
     

            
    




	We are seeking passionate individuals to build and nurture long-term investment relationships.
	If you excel at client engagement, portfolio growth, and understand investment products, this role is for you.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and engage prospective clients
	Provide advisory on investment products and wealth growth strategies
	Maintain relationships with high-net-worth clients
	Contribute to overall revenue growth through sales and client retention.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree / Higher National Diploma in Business, Marketing, Finance, or a related field
	3 - 5 years of experience in financial services, client acquisition, or portfolio management
	Strong interpersonal skills and sales acumen.


Method of Application

  "description": "Amy Consulting - Our client,&nbsp;RY Projects, is a leading real estate and architecture firm committed to creating innovative and sustainable spaces.

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Osborne, Victoria Island - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Company: RY Projects

Job Description


	We are seeking an experienced and highly organized Project Manager to oversee and coordinate construction and design projects from conception to completion.
	The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of building codes and construction processes, and be capable of effectively managing stakeholders and vendors to ensure timely and cost-effective project delivery.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, coordinate, and supervise all phases of building and infrastructure projects
	Ensure compliance with relevant building codes, regulations, and safety standards
	Manage project scope, budget, and timelines, and report on progress to senior management
	Monitor construction and site activities to ensure quality standards are met
	Identify risks and develop mitigation strategies throughout the project lifecycle
	Collaborate with architects, engineers, contractors, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment on project goals
	Negotiate and manage vendor contracts, timelines, and deliverables
	Provide regular updates to internal and external stakeholders
	Prepare proposals and make solid presentations.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Architecture, Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field
	Minimum of 5 - 7 years of proven experience in project management within the real estate or construction industry
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian building codes and construction standards
	Excellent leadership, negotiation, and communication skills
	Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work under pressure
	Proficient in Microsoft Project or other project management tools
	Must be able to resume within a reasonable time frame.


Salary
Very competitive (N400,000 - N500,000 monthly).

Method of Application

Project Manager Job at Amy Consulting




        
    

        
        Amy Consulting - Our client, RY Projects, is a leading real estate and architecture firm committed to creating innovative and sustainable spaces.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location: Osborne, Victoria Island - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Company: RY Projects

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking an experienced and highly organized Project Manager to oversee and coordinate construction and design projects from conception to completion.
	The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of building codes and construction processes, and be capable of effectively managing stakeholders and vendors to ensure timely and cost-effective project delivery.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, coordinate, and supervise all phases of building and infrastructure projects
	Ensure compliance with relevant building codes, regulations, and safety standards
	Manage project scope, budget, and timelines, and report on progress to senior management
	Monitor construction and site activities to ensure quality standards are met
	Identify risks and develop mitigation strategies throughout the project lifecycle
	Collaborate with architects, engineers, contractors, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment on project goals
	Negotiate and manage vendor contracts, timelines, and deliverables
	Provide regular updates to internal and external stakeholders
	Prepare proposals and make solid presentations.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Architecture, Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field
	Minimum of 5 - 7 years of proven experience in project management within the real estate or construction industry
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian building codes and construction standards
	Excellent leadership, negotiation, and communication skills
	Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work under pressure
	Proficient in Microsoft Project or other project management tools
	Must be able to resume within a reasonable time frame.


Salary
Very competitive (N400,000 - N500,000 monthly).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: recruitment@amyconsulting.com.ng and cc: hr@ryprojects.com using "Project Manager - RY Projects" as the subject of the mail.
